name: Who Wants to Waste an Afternoon?
overview: "Who Wants to Waste an Afternoon?" is a quiz game for the C64. It was heavily inspired by "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?". It was developed by Lee Novak and published in the following... Loadstar #195 +#196 + #197 + #198 + #199 + #201 + #202 + #203 + #208 + #211
